alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued February 12 at 2:45AM EST until February 13 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST /8 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 6 to 9 feet expected in the surf zone. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Bay and Gulf County Beaches. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, until 9 PM EST /8 PM CST/ this evening. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
